channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024021041
item.description:
Report X-2024021041

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-09
  • City: BELTSVILLE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found wet box in the damage hazmat cage. I filled out the required paperwork and repackaged the damage in a salvage drum. DescribePack: The package failure was from internal leakage caused by a loose cap on some of the container. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The leaking package was placed in a tub and taken to the damage hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2024020801
item.description:
Report X-2024020801

  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS PULLED OUT OF ORIGIN TRAILER STAINED, DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION FOUND 4 OUT OF 4 BOTTLES TO HAVE BROKEN SEALS AND LOOSE CAPS WHICH ALLOWED THE PRODUCT TO LEAK OUT DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: RED TOTE

item.title: Report X-2024020377
item.description:
Report X-2024020377

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-18
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE FELL OFF THE ROLLER LINE DURING SORTATION. DescribePack: THE FALL CAUSED THE CAP TO COME LOOSE AND THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.description:
